This attack deals 1 additional bludgeoning damage (Maximum +3) to every ally within 5 feet of the target.

Trigger An ally within 5 feet would be hit by a melee or ranged attack.

Effect: The ally gains +2 to their AC and may Step as a free action as the Stonechild helps push them to safety
